transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: haji mam
Executive: sir good morning ayat marble minds se baat ho rahi hai meri
Customer: ji mam
Executive: reena baat kar rahi hu sir india mart se durgesh ki senior
Customer: ji boliye
Executive: ji actually kal durgesh se aapka services ke regarding discussion hua tha sir uske baad kuch feedback message kiye the whatsapp pe regarding di matlab india mart services and how was your interaction with your account manage to waha pe aapne not satisfied diya tha to kuch issue hai sir like durgesh se services ke regarding isliye aapne not durgesh se nahi hai mujhe ab to india mart se hi hai
Customer: acha aap i know kyuki aapne pichla pichla package tha mera 60000 rupay mein do saal hmm theek hai usme se marble ki lead bahut kam aati thi usme bhi maine bahut kam lead ki hai hmm hmm uske baad unhone bola ke thoda isse bhi bada package lo
Executive: theek hai
Customer: ye package acha nahi hai to maine isse bhi bada package leke 60 65000 rupay mein ek package karwa liya maximiz hum theek hai hmm isme bhi marble ki kam lede aa rahi hai fiber ki frp ki plastic ki shirmer ki inki lede bahut jyada aa rahi hai
Executive: acha marble temple ki nahi hai hmm
Customer: marble temple marble fountain ki bahut kam aa rahi hai jaise 100 lead aa rahi hai na to 10 hai na marble ki aa rahi hai to 90 aise aa rahi hai
Executive: ek second ek second
Customer: to maine jis din package liya tha na hmm us din se shikayat kar raha hu abhi dekh lo aap kitne mahine ho gaye char mahine sir ek cheez aap mujhe batao jaise aap bata rahe ho marble fountain ki nahi aa rahi hai ab main ye dekh rahi hu jaise aapne ek by lead purchase kiya hai wall fountain se aur decorative fountain se to decorative fountain mein to sir aapko non marble ki bhi by lead aayengi
Customer: to dekho unko yahi bol raha hu main jisme marble kya hai wohi lagao mere
Executive: to aap na aapne ye by lead purchase kiya aapke catalog mein kahin bhi added nahi hai ye to ye aap hi end se edit hoga
Customer: wo bol rahe hain ki hai na ke lead lo aapki mahine ki lede bahut kam aa rahi hai to fir lead uthani padegi mujhe
Executive: main aapki baat se agree karti hu lekin aap galat by lead loge to usme me to aapka fayda nahi hai na sir man lo agar aapne multiple by lead decorative ki fountain ki lead aa hi nahi rahi fir kuch to lena padega
Customer: marble fountain ki bilkul nahi aa rahi hai
Executive: na ke barabar aa rahi hai
Customer: main dekh leti hu hamare paas approve ho rahi hai ho sakta hai sir ki aapke yahan by lead purchase karne se pehle aapki lead sold out ho rahi hogi aap do minute bas line pe raho jo achi lede aa rahi hai na wo second mein gayab ho rahi hai
Executive: ha within a seconds mein bhi gayab ho jayegi sir kyuki aapki category mein 300 supplier available hai aur jo jyada active hai system pe jo jitna time de raha hai refresh kar raha hai by lead pe wo lead obviously si baat hai pehle consume kar lega kyuki white marble temple mein na aap ye cheez dekhna aapke jo other competitor hai makrana se jaise jante bhi ho aap deba marble ho gaya belan stone ho gaya crown marble aur ye artifact ho gaya ye jitne bhi supplier hai na in logo ne apne india mart package services ko use karne ke liye do do staff baitha rakhe hain ab unke staff ka kya kam hota hai india mart login kar lenge system pe aur jo by lead ka tap hota hai usko har do se teen minute mein wo refresh karte rehte hain to by lead jaise hi post hoti hai india mart pe jati har ek supplier ke paas hai jo marble mein deal kar raha hai lekin consume keval panch log kar sakte hain ab sir wo panch log to 200 mein se koi bhi ho sakta hai na sir ab wahi hota hai jo jyada active hai jitna refresh karo isliye by lead purchase kar le raha hai aap system se use karte ho by lead ya fir phone se karte ho sir phone se phone se phone se karte ho aap to agar system se aap karte ho to iske liye ek main aapko ye matlab resolution de sakti thi ki aap na by lead pe extension ka filter laga sakte ho auto refresh ka ek option hota hai jisko aap download karne ke baad india mart jo aapka catalog hai us pe extension ka ek wo laga sakte ho time setting ki aapka auto by lead refresh ho kitni der rahunga hamare kam dekhne hai na
Customer: ha wahi hai ki aap akele ho na sir use karne ke liye isme hamare kam dekhne ka 1% hi nahi hai
Executive: abhi ek che minute pehle marble fountain ki mumbai se by lead aayi thi ye purchase kiye sir aapne
Customer: kitne mahine pehle
Executive: che minute pehle aayi hai six minutes pehle abhi abhi to nahi dekha maine
Customer: aap ek bar apna india mart open kar lo
Customer: ji kar liya ek abhi lead aayi hai just now tamilnadu ki
Executive: nahi ye to mumbai ki hai konsi hai tamilnadu wali jo aap bata rahe ho
Customer: abhi just aayi hai recent pe ja ke
Executive: theek hai konse product ki hai wahi puch rahi sir main
Customer: temple ki
Executive: ha to usko consume kar lo agar aapko kam ki lagi hui hai to ho nahi raha
Customer: sold out aa raha hai
Customer: ha ek kam karo aap most relevant aur most recent ke just bagal mein aap dekho ek past lead ka option aa raha hoga
Executive: kya
Customer: past lead ka ek option aa raha hoga by lead pe jab aapne click ha most relevant aur recent ke just bagal mein aap dekhna aa raha hai us pe click karo aap i am interested lagaya hai i am interested turant kar do aap us pe jo bhi sold out ho ja rahi hai lead na aap kyuki kya ho raha hai na ki by lead ek second mein bhi sold out ho sakti hai jab tak aap lead pe click karoge jab tak aap contact by now pe click karne jaoge usse pehle bhi purchase ho jayegi by lead ka flow mein koi dikkat nahi hai har mahine 300 350 400 by lead aa rahi hai sir white marble temple ki problem waha aa raha hai na ki jo by lead aap jab check kar rahe ho to us time pe by lead sold out ho ja rahi hai to ya to aap jaise man lo ek kam aisa kar sakte ho agar aap system pe available nahi reh sakte to jo mobile application hai aapka india mart pe for example agar man lo aap ek ghante ke liye active ho abhi aapne ye decide kiya ek ghante mein india mart use karta hu us ek ghante ke beech mein na aap har do char minute mein aap by lead ka jo tab hota hai na latest by lead ka uske upar click karte rehna india mart pe by lead har 10 se 15 minute mein aapki category mein post hoti rehti hai sir aap dekhna 15 minute 20 minute ke duration mein by lead aati rehti hai aur wo aati hai turant sold out hoti hai to isse ye benefit hoga ki din mein agar 10 by lead bhi aati hai to 10 mein se kam se kam teen by lead to aap easily purchase kar loge sir agar aap inka kya karu main fiber ka fiber ka fiber ke liye aapko fir yahi karna padega wo to aayega kyuki decorative fountain ki by lead aapne purchase kiya decorative to main guide kar deti hu kaise hatega aap wo upar by lead ke right side mein dekhna three dot ka option aa raha hoga top pe three dot pe aap click karna waha by lead preferences ka ek option aa raha hoga ji waha pe aap jao pehla location preferences aa raha hoga uske niche aap dekhna ek option aa raha hoga category preferences ka ji category preferences pe aap click karoge to waha do option aa raha hoga based on your product based on your by lead consumption aur niche aa raha hoga exclude category option not preferred ye to maine kiya tha pehle bhi nahi aapne kiya tha dobara se aapne by lead purchase kar liya na fir dobara add ho gaya wo jab aap click karoge na hmm jaise aap click karoge aapko kuch keywords dikhega jaise stone pillar wall fountain decorative fountain sand stone carvings to ye wo product hai jiske sirf aapne by lead purchase kiya hai ye sare product aapke catalog mein added nahi hai to inme se aap wall fountain hata do aur decorative fountain hata do sir mujhe ek bar starting se wapas batana aap dekho exclude more ka option aa raha hai waha pe niche do not prefer category likha aa raha hoga nahi bhai aapne category preferences pe click kiya category bhi hai isme main batati hu by lead preferences pe aapne click kiya ji waha pe pehle aa raha hoga location preferences uske niche aa raha hoga category preferences nahi sir aata hai sir aap dekho aapne by lead preferences pe click kiya to sabse pehle kya option dikh raha hai aapko by lead ye kahan pe hai by lead likha hua niche aa raha hai nahi main batati hu aapne by lead jahan se aap purchase karte ho us pe aapne click kiya ha kiya ab upar top pe right hand side pe dekhna three dot ka option aa raha hoga ji aaya us pe jab aap click karoge to ek second last option dikh raha hoga aapko by lead preferences ka ji last hai ha us pe aap click karna by lead preferences pe jaise hi aap waha pe click karoge aapko do option milega pehla option aayega location preferences ka uske niche aap thoda scroll down karoge to second option aayega category preferences ka ji uske upar click karo aap kar diya ab waha pe jab click karoge to ek option aa raha hoga do not prefer category exclude more likha hua aa raha hoga ji mam exclude more pe aap jao waha pe aap type karo decorative fountain jaise hi aap decorative fountain waha type karoge na niche aapko auto reflect ho jayega wo category okay us pe click karke add karna hai aapko exclude karna hai matlab us category ko ji mam kar dunga ha usme aap wall fountain bhi kar dena dusra aap mujhe ye batao stone pillars mein to aap deal kar rahe ho na ji kar rahe hain theek hai to stone pillar aapke catalog mein add kar do kyuki aapne sirf by lead purchase kiya ye aapke products mein added nahi hai ji kar do theek hai stone pillar main add kar deti hu so that ki iski bhi thoda sa matlab visibility rahegi to inquiries aur calls bhi aayenge theek hai ye main add kar deti hu dusra aapko thoda sa na yahi hai ki by lead aap jab past lead pe click karoge na to aapko har che sat minute mein achi by lead dikhayenge jo sold out ho ja rahi hai by lead ka flow bahut acha hai bas wahi hai ki jaise maine aapko trick bataya ki ek ghante ke liye for example aap active ho to har panch se char minute ke andar aap us pe by lead ke tab pe refresh karte rehna fir wo kam se kam teen char to easily aap purchase kar loge 10 mein se theek hai second thing sir ye calls itni miss kyu ho rahi hai matlab aapne ek hi number add kiya hai apne pns mein preferred number mein aur waha pe 50% se upar ki call aapki miss ho ja rahi hai around 60% call aapki miss ho rahi hai to waha pe kya problem aa rahi hai do teen din pehle call aaya tha ek main aapko batati hu aapke paas is month mein na overall teen se char call aayi thi jisme se aapne ek call answer kiya baki ki teen call aapki miss hui hai kis number pe aaya call number to sir aapko wo lead manager mein dikhayega jab lead manager pe aap click karoge na to waha pe recent call mein mere hisab se ek call aaya hai wo ek call piya hai na ke hamare liye koi kam ho to batana baki ka to ek miss ho gaya aur september mein bhi yahi cheez hua tha september mein bhi jo call aayi thi na usme se teen char call miss ho gayi thi aapki acha call miss bhi kafi ho rahi hai jo wo call hai na jo aap bata rahe ho ki aapne answer kiya yaha pe main us call ki bhi aapko bata rahi hu jo call aapki miss ho gayi hai ho sakta hai aap dusre call pe busy hoge kyuki ek hi number add hai na aapka abhi pehle to shayad do number aapne add kiya tha last mein 106 tha ha pehle do the ha ki pehle do number added tha to usse ye benefit hota hai ki aapne call nahi uthaya to auto call transfer aapke alternate numbers pe ho jata tha abhi kya ek hi number hai to aap busy rehte hoge to baki call miss call mein chali jati hongi aapki ek aur ko ek aur number karo aap ha ek number aap aur add karo sir maximum to aap panch number add kar sakte ho but minimum at least aapko do ya teen number to add karne hi chahiye theek hai mam abhi aur kar dunga ha ye cheeze kar lo baki rating review to theek hai last month mein ek customer ne aapko negative rating diya tha 43 aapka overall hai ye issue naam ka koi buyer hai makrana ka marble fountain ke regarding diya hai isne issue issue naam hai is customer ka nahi mam i don't know ha matlab isne aise hi de diya hoga rating aapke paas number uska reflect ho raha hoga lead manager mein isne do ka rating diya hai overall rating theek hai 43 ka hai aapka koi issue nahi hai isko aap thoda sa yahi hai ki increase kar lena kisi bhi customer se aapko lag raha hai ki positive discussion ho raha hai to unko simply aap ask for review ka jo option hota hai na jahan se aap rating ka link share karte ho waha se aap unko link share karke rating ki demand karna to ye jo negative rating abhi recent mein dikh raha hai na wo aapka niche chala jayega hide ho jayega wo theek hai theek hai baki isko main jo aapne ek feedback diya tha na ye basically aapne durgesh ke regarding diya tha sir india mart ke regarding nahi tha main aapko yahi bata rahi thi ki yaha pe likha tha na ek ye bhi hai durgesh ko itna kuch aata nahi hai marble ke liye acha durgesh ko matlab aap ye keh rahe ho ki aapko proper wo resolution nahi de pata hai ha koi manager aisa lagao jo marble mein hai main ek kam karti hu main ek bar dekh leti hu sir ki main aapka catalog kisko assign kar sakti hu for now ek kam aap ye karna ki koi issue aata hai to aap mera number note kar lo mujhe call kar lena aap okay okay aap number note down kar lo mera yahi number hai kya aapka ye bhi hai par isme sometime aisa ho sakta hai ki ye hamara official did number hai to kabhi kabhi internet issue hota hai network issue ke vajah se connectivity nahi ho pati hai to aap mera ek aur number note kar lo us pe aap mujhe call kar lena sir us pe turant main call ha 727 727 00 00 639 639 41 41 theek hai is number pe aap mujhe call kar lena abhi jis tarike se maine aapko bataya hai na aap us tarike se use karo aur aap koi bhi irrelevant by lead mat purchase karna sir decorative fountain ki jo category hai wo generic category hai usme aapko fiber ka aur multiple jo hai ceramic ka kisi ka bhi lead aa sakta hai theek hai ye aap karna mere ko aap call kar lena koi issue aata hai baki ye jo not satisfied ka tha na isko for now main close kar deti hu aapke paas ek dobara ka feedback dobara feedback aayega jo mere regarding hoga sir theek hai theek hai theek hai sir theek hai okay thank you sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Marble leads are very less.

- Wants marble temple and fountain leads.

- Dissatisfied with Durgesh's service.

- Calls are being missed.



Resolution:

- Suggested to exclude decorative fountain category.

- Executive added stone pillar to catalog.

- Provided tips to get more relevant buyleads.

- Suggested adding more numbers to avoid missed calls.

- Provided alternate number for support.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add more numbers.

- Executive will check for catalog assignment.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, missed calls
